channel.title: File on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in File on My blog

item.title: What is Symlink
item.description: A symbolic link is a file that contains a reference to another file. That reference take form as a path in its absolute or relative form. A symlink may contains a path that point to nothing Synonym symlink soft link

item.title: What is File Permission
item.description: Each file as his own permission set. It allows to control the ability of the users to view, change, navigate, and execute the contents of the file system Notation for Unix system Permission can be seen in its symbolic notation using ls -l $ ls -l total 16 -rw-rw-r-- 1 level03 level03 0 Aug 2 17:22 foo with ls -l the 1st column is used to represent the file type and his permission.
